original_text: And David said to all the congregation, Now bless the Lord your God. And all the congregation blessed the Lord God of their fathers, and bowed down their heads, and worshipped the Lord, and the king.
korean_text: 다윗이 온 회중에게 이르되 너희는 너희 하나님 여호와를 송축하라 하매 회중이 그의 조상들의 하나님 여호와를 송축하고 머리를 숙여 여호와와 왕에게 절하고

sentences.original_text: And David said to all the congregation
Now bless the Lord your God
And all the congregation blessed the Lord God of their fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 온 회중이 그 조상들의 하나님 여호와를 송축하고
